revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruins of Alph |image = [[File:Ruins of Alph.png]] |caption = A map of the Ruins of Alph. |tokens = 3,000 |location = South of Violet City, on Route 32. }} '''Ruins of Alph''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 60,600 |- | Unown (Boss) || 260,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Natu * Wooper * Quagsire * Smeargle * Magikarp * Poliwag * Poliwhirl * Unown A, L, P, or H (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 25% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
